export

Export: Java (.java)

  Source file, ver. 1.8

Export: XML (.xml)

Experimental: simple XML format for exchange with other applications.

Export: graphic

The whole diagram is exported, as it appears on the screen, in the following formats: PNG, EMF, SWF, PDF, SVG

Export selected: graphic

A selected part can be exported to the clipboard in formats: EMF, PNG

Private file save (.nsd)

XML private, with all the necessary information: code, colors, palette, fonts etc.
